product_name: Easton Mountain Products Trek Pole Snow Baskets - Pair
long_description: The 80mm diameter Easton Mountain Products Trek Pole Snow Baskets are sized for snow trekking or backcountry touring. Baskets are compatible with standard tipped trekking poles, including the following Easton models: Trail AL2, Trail AL3, Hike AL3, Backcountry AL3 Shock and Hike Carbon 3.
short_description: The 80mm diameter Easton Mountain Products Trek Pole Snow Baskets are sized for snow trekking or backcountry touring.
